0.1.1.name: wordpress/codecolorer-markdown
0.1.1.description:
This plugin automatically wraps Markdown code blocks (indented by 4 spaces or a tab) in CodeColorer tags. You can also specify what language the given snippet uses, by using the following syntax:

    :ruby:
    class Foo < Bar
    end

That is, the name of the language, as you'd use it when creating a CodeColorer block, enclosed by two colons on the very first line of the code snippet.

The source code repository can be found over at GitHub.
